comment:
EvoEngine - game development engine

 Description:
 EvoEngine is a game development engine for
 $(LINK2 https://dlang.org, D language) intended to
 game developers. It provides basic building blocks for writing
 games.

 Currently EvoEngine consists of the following packages:

 - $(LINK2 ./evoengine/utils.html, evoengine.utils) - basic utils used by other modules (memory management, ecs, logging, etc.)

 Copyright: WetGrape 2023.
 License: Mit.
 Authors: Gedert Korney
name: evoengine

members.name: FILO
members.comment: `F`irst `I`n `L`ast `O`ut

members.name: FIFO
members.comment: `F`irst `I`n `F`irst `O`ut

members.name: Order
members.comment: Write/Read ordering.

members.name: serialize
members.comment: Serialize data into BinaryBuffer.

members.name: deserialize
members.comment: Deserialize data from BinaryBuffer.

members.name: Serializable
members.comment:
Interface for all serializable data types working with BinaryBuffer.
 In the future it will be used as the main tool for saving/loading scenes,
 models, etc.

members.name: rawWrite
members.comment: Help raw write method. Only write one variable to inner data buffer.

members.name: rawWrite
members.comment: Help raw write method. Only write one-dimensional array to inner data buffer.(ONE-DIMENSIONAL)

members.name: rawRead
members.comment: Help raw read method. Only read one variable from inner data buffer.

members.name: rawRead
members.comment: Help raw read method. Only read one-dimensional array from inner data buffer.(ONE-DIMENSIONAL)

members.name: innerWrite
members.comment: Inner wrap method on top rawWrite. Allow use multidimensional arrays.

members.name: innerRead
members.comment: Inner wrap method on top rawRead. Allow use multidimensional arrays.

members.name: write
members.comment: Wrap on top innerWrite. Enable debuging/checking in `BinaryBuffer`.

members.name: read
members.comment: Wrap on top innerRead. Enable debuging/checking in `BinaryBuffer`.

members.name: BinaryBuffer
members.comment:
`BinaryBuffer` implement binary serialization structure. This structure
  have only one template argument - `order`. If `order = Order.FIFO`, then the
  order of reading should be the reverse of writing(`F`irst `I`n `L`ast `O`ut).
  Else order of reading should be the order of writing(`F`irst `I`n `F`irst `O`ut).

members.name: ObjectData
members.comment:
`ObjectData` - contain object, nameId for remove string by id and alias for
 inner free list. NAME ID MUST BE UPDATE AFTER ALL REGISTER AND UNREGISTER.

members.name: ObjectName
members.comment:
`ObjectName` - contain name of object and object id. This struct used for create
 Set of object names for fast get id by name.

members.name: register
members.comment:
registering object by name and object.
 Returns: unique object id. This object id can't be changed.
 TODO: Refactoring.

members.name: ClassRegistrator
members.comment:
`ClassRegistrator` - struct that can register object of `BasicClass`
 by name. When you register object, you get unique id. By this unique
 id you can fast: unregister, get or replace object. You can do it with
 strings, but this operation is slow. You can get object id by string and
 work with object by id.

members.name: RangeColor
members.comment:
The task of this data structures is to effectively color any
 limited range in red or green, as well as to give quick answers
 to any query. For example: give me a range suitable for 5 green
 elements or more. Painting 5 elements of this green range in red.
 also, its main task is to try to avoid fragmentation of colored
 ranges, looking for ranges from the beginning of the array.

members.originalType: ref (size_t start, size_t end, RangeColor color = RangeColor.Red)

ComponentManager
members.comment: TODO: Rewrite on PoolAllocator and optimize algorithm.

comment:
Implementation Component classes for ECS.

 Description:
 This module contain classes for allocate and deallocate components for
 enttities in ECS. ComponentArray isn't thread-safty and needed in thread synchronizations.
 ECS is built so that it works as a separate thread - synchronizations using in communicating
 with him and communication with the systems inside.
name: evoengine.utils.ecs.component

members.originalType: void(EntityId entity, ComponentTypeId componentType, ComponentId componentId)

opIndex
members.comment:
For opIndex there are three cases: If static array return dynamic
   array pointing on array in IPoolAllocator, else if array is dynamic
   then like in first case returning dynamic array, else return
   reference to the element, becouse that is not array.

members.comment:
For opIndex there are three cases: If static array return dynamic
   array pointing on array in IPoolAllocator, else if array is dynamic
   then like in first case returning dynamic array, else return
   reference to the element, becouse that is not array.

members.name: IPoolAllocator
members.comment: Interface of all PoolAllocator with index adressation.

comment:
PoolAllocator with index adressation.
 In constructor Pool allocator allocate big block of memory.
 Pool allocator have three implementations:
 first for compile-time type identification, second for real-time size identification,
 third like interface for others, and implement custom PoolAllocator with custom optimizations.
 (two for support scripting languages).
name: evoengine.experemental.utils.memory.poolallocator
